title: Polygons of Regions — ply_rgns
text: Intersection polygons describing BOEM internal regions (BOEM Offshore Oil Gas Planning Areas) clipped federal U.S. waters 200 nm Exclusive Economic Zone 12 nm state waters (MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act).

title: Polygons of Regions — ply_rgns
text: spatial features sf data frame 27 rows 8 columns: shlf_key key shelf polygon containing region shlf_name name shelf polygon containing region rgn_key key region polygon rgn_name name region polygon ctr_lon centroid longitude ctr_lat centroid longitude area_km2 area square kilometers geometry geometry polygon `sf::st_geometry()`

title: Polygons of Regions — ply_rgns
text: BOEM Offshore Oil Gas Planning Areas MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act

what: Polygons of Regions, simplified to 5% — ply_rgns_s05
title: Polygons of Regions, simplified to 5% — ply_rgns_s05
text: Intersection polygons describing BOEM internal regions (BOEM Offshore Oil Gas Planning Areas) clipped federal U.S. waters 200 nm Exclusive Economic Zone 12 nm state waters (MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act). Simplified 5% original vertices quickly plotting.

title: Polygons of Regions, simplified to 5% — ply_rgns_s05
Polygons of Regions, simplified to 5% — ply_rgns_s05
text: spatial features sf data frame 27 rows 8 columns: shlf_key key shelf polygon containing region shlf_name name shelf polygon containing region rgn_key key region polygon rgn_name name region polygon ctr_lon centroid longitude ctr_lat centroid longitude area_km2 area square kilometers geometry geometry polygon `sf::st_geometry()`

title: Polygons of Shelf Regions — ply_shlfs
text: Intersection polygons describing BOEM internal regions (BOEM Offshore Oil Gas Planning Areas) clipped federal U.S. waters 200 nm Exclusive Economic Zone 12 nm state waters (MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act). Summarized Outer Continental Shelf (OCS) region name (key): Alaska (AK), Atlantic (ATL), Gulf Mexico (GOM), Hawaii (HI), Pacific (PAC).

title: Polygons of Shelf Regions — ply_shlfs
text: spatial features sf data frame 5 rows 6 columns: shlf_key key shelf polygon containing region shlf_name name shelf polygon containing region ctr_lon centroid longitude ctr_lat centroid longitude area_km2 area square kilometers geometry geometry polygon `sf::st_geometry()`

title: Polygons of Shelf Regions — ply_shlfs
text: BOEM Offshore Oil Gas Planning Areas MarineCadastre Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act

Summarized Outer Continental Shelf (OCS) region name (key): Alaska (AK), Atlantic (ATL), Gulf Mexico (GOM), Hawaii (HI), Pacific (PAC). Simplified 5% original vertices quickly plotting.
